author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.1: gifena in ðys ginnan grunde.      Heo ðar ða gearwe funde
text.2: mundbyrd æt ðam mæran þeodne,      þa heo ahte mæste þearfe,
text.3: hyldo þæs hehstan deman,      þæt he hie wið þæs hehstan brogan
text.4: gefriðode, frymða waldend.      Hyre ðæs fæder on roderum
text.5: torhtmod tiðe gefremede,      þe heo ahte trumne geleafan
text.6: a to ðam ælmihtigan.      Gefrægen ic ða Holofernus
text.7: winhatan wyrcean georne      ond eallum wundrum þrymlic
text.8: girwan up swæsendo.      To ðam het se gumena baldor
text.9: ealle ða yldestan ðegnas;      hie ðæt ofstum miclum
text.10: ræfndon, rondwiggende,      comon to ðam rican þeodne
text.11: feran, folces ræswan.      þæt wæs þy feorðan dogore
text.12: þæs ðe Iudith hyne,      gleaw on geðonce,
text.14: Hie ða to ðam symle      sittan eodon,
text.15: wlance to wingedrince,      ealle his weagesiðas,
text.16: bealde byrnwiggende.      þær wæron bollan steape
text.17: boren æfter bencum gelome,      swylce eac bunan ond orcas
text.18: fulle fletsittendum;      hie þæt fæge þegon,
text.19: rofe rondwiggende,      þeah ðæs se rica ne wende,
text.20: egesful eorla dryhten.      ða wearð Holofernus,
text.22: hloh ond hlydde,      hlynede ond dynede,
text.23: þæt mihten fira bearn      feorran gehyran
text.24: hu se stiðmoda      styrmde ond gylede,
text.27: Swa se inwidda      ofer ealne dæg
text.29: swiðmod sinces brytta,      oðþæt hie on swiman lagon,
text.30: oferdrencte his duguðe ealle,      swylce hie wæron deaðe geslegene,
text.31: agotene goda gehwylces.      Swa het se gumena aldor
text.33: nealæhte niht seo þystre.      Het ða niða geblonden
text.37: anbyhtscealcas,      swa him heora ealdor bebead,
text.39: to ðam gysterne,      þær hie Iudithðe
text.42: þa torhtan mægð      to træfe þam hean,
text.43: þær se rica hyne      reste on symbel
text.49: on æghwylcne      þe ðær inne com
text.50: hæleða bearna,      ond on hyne nænig
text.51: monna cynnes,      nymðe se modiga hwæne
text.52: niðe rofra      him þe near hete
text.53: rinca to rune gegangan.      Hie ða on reste gebrohton
text.54: snude ða snoteran idese;      eodon ða stercedferhðe,
text.55: hæleð heora hearran cyðan      þæt wæs seo halige meowle
text.56: gebroht on his burgetelde.      þa wearð se brema on mode
text.57: bliðe, burga ealdor,      þohte ða beorhtan idese
text.58: mid widle ond mid womme besmitan.      Ne wolde þæt wuldres dema
text.59: geðafian, þrymmes hyrde,      ac he him þæs ðinges gestyrde,
text.60: dryhten, dugeða waldend.      Gewat ða se deofulcunda,
text.62: bealofull his beddes neosan,      þær he sceolde his blæd forleosan
text.63: ædre binnan anre nihte;      hæfde ða his ende gebidenne
text.64: on eorðan unswæslicne,      swylcne he ær æfter worhte,
text.65: þearlmod ðeoden gumena,      þenden he on ðysse worulde
text.66: wunode under wolcna hrofe.      Gefeol ða wine swa druncen
text.67: se rica on his reste middan,      swa he nyste ræda nanne
text.69: ut of ðam inne      ofstum miclum,
text.74: hu heo þone atolan      eaðost mihte
text.78: scurum heardne,      ond of sceaðe abræd
text.79: swiðran folme;      ongan ða swegles weard
text.82: "Ic ðe, frymða god      ond frofre gæst,
text.85: ðrynesse ðrym.      þearle ys me nu ða
text.87: swyðe mid sorgum gedrefed.      Forgif me, swegles ealdor,
text.88: sigor ond soðne geleafan,      þæt ic mid þys sweorde mote
text.89: geheawan þysne morðres bryttan;      geunne me minra gesynta,
text.90: þearlmod þeoden gumena.      Nahte ic þinre næfre
text.91: miltse þon maran þearfe.      Gewrec nu, mihtig dryhten,
text.92: torhtmod tires brytta,      þæt me ys þus torne on mode,
text.93: hate on hreðre minum."      Hi ða se hehsta dema
text.94: ædre mid elne onbryrde,      swa he deð anra gehwylcne
text.95: herbuendra      þe hyne him to helpe seceð
text.96: mid ræde ond mid rihte geleafan.      þa wearð hyre rume on mode,
text.97: haligre hyht geniwod;      genam ða þone hæðenan mannan
text.98: fæste be feaxe sinum,      teah hyne folmum wið hyre weard
text.101: swa heo ðæs unlædan      eaðost mihte
text.105: þone sweoran him,      þæt he on swiman læg,
text.106: druncen ond dolhwund.      Næs ða dead þa gyt,
text.109: þone hæðenan hund,      þæt him þæt heafod wand
text.110: forð on ða flore.      Læg se fula leap
text.112: under neowelne næs      ond ðær genyðerad wæs,
text.116: æfter hinsiðe.      Ne ðearf he hopian no,
text.117: þystrum forðylmed,      þæt he ðonan mote
text.118: of ðam wyrmsele,      ac ðær wunian sceal
text.119: awa to aldre      butan ende forð
text.120: in ðam heolstran ham,      hyhtwynna leas.
text.122: Iudith æt guðe,      swa hyre god uðe,
text.123: swegles ealdor,      þe hyre sigores onleah.
text.124: þa seo snotere mægð      snude gebrohte
text.126: on ðam fætelse      þe hyre foregenga,
text.129: ond hit þa swa heolfrig      hyre on hond ageaf,
text.131: Iudith gingran sinre.      Eodon ða gegnum þanonne
text.134: eadhreðige mægð,      ut of ðam herige,
text.142: in ðam fæstenne,      swa ðam folce ær
text.144: searoðoncol mægð,      þa heo on sið gewat,
text.145: ides ellenrof.      Wæs ða eft cumen
text.146: leof to leodum,      ond ða lungre het
text.148: of ðære ginnan byrig      hyre togeanes gan,
text.150: þurh ðæs wealles geat,      ond þæt word acwæð
text.151: to ðam sigefolce:      "Ic eow secgan mæg
text.152: þoncwyrðe þing,      þæt ge ne þyrfen leng
text.153: murnan on mode.      Eow ys metod bliðe,
text.155: geond woruld wide,      þæt eow ys wuldorblæd
text.157: þara læðða      þe ge lange drugon."
text.159: syððan hi gehyrdon      hu seo halige spræc
text.160: ofer heanne weall.      Here wæs on lustum.
text.162: weras wif somod,      wornum ond heapum,
text.163: ðreatum ond ðrymmum      þrungon ond urnon
text.166: men on ðære medobyrig      mod areted,
text.167: syððan hie ongeaton      þæt wæs Iudith cumen
text.168: eft to eðle,      ond ða ofostlice
text.170: þa seo gleawe het,      golde gefrætewod,
text.173: ond hyt to behðe      blodig ætywan
text.174: þam burhleodum,      hu hyre æt beaduwe gespeow.
text.175: Spræc ða seo æðele      to eallum þam folce:
text.180: þe us monna mæst      morðra gefremede,
text.181: sarra sorga,      ond þæt swyðor gyt
text.182: ycan wolde,      ac him ne uðe god
text.183: lengran lifes,      þæt he mid læððum us
text.184: eglan moste;      ic him ealdor oðþrong
text.185: þurh godes fultum.      Nu ic gumena gehwæne
text.188: fysan to gefeohte.      Syððan frymða god,
text.195: gedemed to deaðe,      ond ge dom agon,
text.196: tir æt tohtan,      swa eow getacnod hafað
text.198: þa wearð snelra werod      snude gegearewod,
text.201: foron to gefeohte      forð on gerihte,
text.202: hæleð under helmum,      of ðære haligan byrig
text.203: on ðæt dægred sylf.      Dynedan scildas,
text.204: hlude hlummon.      þæs se hlanca gefeah
text.205: wulf in walde,      ond se wanna hrefn,
text.207: þæt him ða þeodguman      þohton tilian
text.208: fylle on fægum;      ac him fleah on last
text.213: hwealfum lindum,      þa ðe hwile ær
text.215: hæðenra hosp.      Him þæt hearde wearð
text.219: to ðam fyrdwicum.      Hie ða fromlice
text.224: in heardra gemang.      Hæleð wæron yrre,
text.234: cwicera manna      þe hie ofercuman mihton.
text.235: Swa ða magoþegnas      on ða morgentid
text.237: oðþæt ongeaton      ða ðe grame wæron,
text.245: atolne ecgplegan.      þa ic ædre gefrægn
text.251: ærðon ðe him se egesa      on ufan sæte,
text.253: þæt se beorna brego      ond seo beorhte mægð
text.254: in ðam wlitegan træfe      wæron ætsomne,
text.255: Iudith seo æðele      ond se galmoda,
text.256: egesfull ond afor.      Næs ðeah eorla nan
text.259: wið ða halgan mægð      hæfde geworden,
text.267: ymbe hyra þeodnes træf      þearle gebylde,
text.271: mid toðon torn þoligende.      þa wæs hyra tires æt ende,
text.272: eades ond ellendæda.      Hogedon þa eorlas aweccan
text.273: hyra winedryhten;      him wiht ne speow.
text.274: þa wearð sið ond late      sum to ðam arod
text.275: þara beadorinca,      þæt he in þæt burgeteld
text.276: niðheard neðde,      swa hyne nyd fordraf.
text.277: Funde ða on bedde      blacne licgan
text.279: lifes belidenne.      He þa lungre gefeoll
text.280: freorig to foldan,      ongan his feax teran,
text.281: hreoh on mode,      ond his hrægl somod,
text.282: ond þæt word acwæð      to ðam wiggendum
text.285: toweard getacnod      þæt þære tide ys
text.286: mid niðum neah geðrungen,      þe we sculon nyde losian,
text.287: somod æt sæcce forweorðan.      Her lið sweorde geheawen,
text.288: beheafdod healdend ure."      Hi ða hreowigmode
text.289: wurpon hyra wæpen of dune,      gewitan him werigferhðe
text.290: on fleam sceacan.      Him mon feaht on last,
text.291: mægeneacen folc,      oð se mæsta dæl
text.294: wulfum to willan      ond eac wælgifrum
text.295: fuglum to frofre.      Flugon ða ðe lyfdon,
text.298: dome gedyrsod;      him feng dryhten god
text.305: þegnas on ða tid      þearle gelyste
text.311: wiggend on wiðertrod,      wælscel on innan,
text.312: reocende hræw.      Rum wæs to nimanne
text.320: swyrdum aswefede.      Hie on swaðe reston,
text.321: þa ðe him to life      laðost wæron
text.322: cwicera cynna.      þa seo cneoris eall,
text.330: eal þæt ða ðeodguman      þrymme geeodon,
text.333: mægð modigre.      Hi to mede hyre
text.336: sweord ond swatigne helm,      swylce eac side byrnan
text.337: gerenode readum golde,      ond eal þæt se rinca baldor
text.339: beaga ond beorhtra maðma,      hi þæt þære beorhtan idese
text.340: ageafon gearoþoncolre.      Ealles ðæs Iudith sægde
text.341: wuldor weroda dryhtne,      þe hyre weorðmynde geaf,
text.342: mærðe on moldan rice,      swylce eac mede on heofonum,
text.343: sigorlean in swegles wuldre,      þæs þe heo ahte soðne geleafan
text.344: to ðam ælmihtigan;      huru æt þam ende ne tweode
text.345: þæs leanes þe heo lange gyrnde.      ðæs sy ðam leofan drihtne
text.346: wuldor to widan aldre,      þe gesceop wind ond lyfte,
text.347: roderas ond rume grundas,      swylce eac reðe streamas
text.348: ond swegles dreamas,      ðurh his sylfes miltse.
